urlset:
http://<{$hostname}><{$folder}> <{$lastmod}> daily
<{foreach key=key1 item=rows from=$rs_disp name=rs_disp}>
http://<{$hostname}><{$rows.rewrite}> <{$lastmod}> weekly
<{/foreach}> <{foreach key=key1 item=rows from=$rs_map name=rs_map}>
http://<{$hostname}><{$rows.rewrite}> <{$lastmod}> weekly
<{/foreach}> <{foreach key=key1 item=rows from=$rs_p name=rs_p}>
http://<{$hostname}><{$rows.rewrite}> <{$lastmod}> weekly
<{/foreach}> <{foreach key=key1 item=rows from=$rs_n name=rs_n}>
http://<{$hostname}><{$rows.rewrite}> <{$lastmod}> weekly
<{/foreach}>
